Class DataHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • DataHandler

  • class DataHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Class responsible for handling the input and output.

      • readInput

        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> readInput()
                                         throws java.io.IOException
        Reads the input and retrieves IBANs from it. Works in two modes which were selected.
        Returns:
        IBANS from input
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an input or output exception occurred

        selectMode()
